English:  Royal Standard of King Albert II of Belgium, who reigned from 1993 to 2013 and maintains his title as King from 2013 to present.

Source

metadata.og:title: File:Coat of Arms of Albert of Belgium (Order of the Seraphim).svg - Wikimedia Commons

text:
DescriptionCoat of Arms of Albert of Belgium (Order of the Seraphim).svg

English:  Coat of arms of Albert Félix Humbert of Belgium as Knight Collar of the Royal Order of the Seraphim (Sweden)
As usual in the Armorial of the Order, Prince Albert of Belgium didn't change his arms as Seraphim Knight whem he became king of the Belgiams as Albert II.
Svenska:  Serafimerorden Albert Félix Humbert av Belgien vapen


Date

15 October 2017


Source

[1], [2]


Author

Heralder, elements by User:Sodacan

 This vector image includes elements that have been taken or adapted from this file: Order of the Seraphim in heraldry.svg (by Ssolbergj).


Permission(Reusing this file)

Own work
